name: Enterprise CRM Migration to Salesforce
summary: Led multi-phase Salesforce implementation for Fortune 500 client, migrating legacy systems and training 200+ users. Achieved 40% increase in sales productivity and 25% faster deal cycles.

name: Power BI Analytics Platform for Retail Chain
summary: Designed and deployed comprehensive Power BI dashboards for multi-location retail client, integrating 15+ data sources. Enabled real-time inventory tracking and predictive sales forecasting.

name: AI-Powered Sales Automation Suite
summary: Commercialized AI/ML solution for B2B SaaS client, automating lead scoring, email personalization, and pipeline forecasting. Reduced manual sales operations by 50%.

name: AWS Cloud Infrastructure Optimization
summary: Partnered with engineering teams to optimize AWS infrastructure for high-growth startup, reducing costs by 45% while improving performance and scalability.

name: Latin American Market Expansion
summary: Spearheaded entry into Spanish and Portuguese-speaking markets for enterprise software provider, establishing relationships with 30+ organizations and generating $3.2M in new revenue.

name: Workflow Automation for Financial Services
summary: Designed end-to-end automation strategy for financial services firm, integrating Salesforce, Power BI, and custom APIs. Reduced manual data entry by 80% and improved compliance reporting.
